header: BRIEF-Indra and ITA Software by Google sign a reseller agreement for airfare shopping engine
body:
* Signs with ITA Software by Google a reseller agreement for airfare pricing and shopping engine QPX

* Indra to integrate ITA’s airfare solutions with its Booking Engine

header: BRIEF-White House pushing Cuba on deals for GE, Google- WSJ, citing sources
body: * Norwegian Cruise Line, Royal Caribbean and Pearl Seas Cruises are also expected to announce deals to start service to Cuba-WSJ, citing sources Source on.wsj.com/2gWCyo7
